item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Paul McCartney
item.description: "And, in the end The love you take is equal to the love you make." -- Paul McCartney

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Hope is the thing with feathers That perches in the soul And sings the tune without the words And never stops at all." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "We'll be Friends Forever, won't we, Pooh?' asked Piglet. Even longer,' Pooh answered." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Sometimes people are beautiful. Not in looks. Not in what they say. Just in what they are." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you’ll be criticized anyway." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "And the Grinch, with his Grinch-feet ice cold in the snow, stood puzzling and puzzling, how could it be so? It came without ribbons. It came without tags. It came without packages, boxes or bags. And he puzzled and puzzled 'till his puzzler was sore. Then the Grinch thought of something he hadn't before. What if Christmas, he thought, doesn't come from a store. What if Christmas, perhaps, means a little bit more." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "So be sure when you step, Step with care and great tact. And remember that life's A Great Balancing Act. And will you succeed? Yes! You will, indeed! (98 and ¾ percent guaranteed) Kid, you'll move mountains." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You're off to Great Places! Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting, So... get on your way!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "They say I'm old-fashioned, and live in the past, but sometimes I think progress progresses too fast!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You'll get mixed up, of course, as you already know. You'll get mixed up with many strange birds as you go. So be sure when you step. Step with care and great tact and remember that Life's a Great Balancing Act. Just never forget to be dexterous and deft. And never mix up your right foot with your left." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Oh the places you'll go! There is fun to be done! There are points to be scored. There are games to be won. And the magical things you can do with that ball will make you the winning-est winner of all." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I’m glad we had the times together just to laugh and sing a song, seems like we just got started and then before you know it, the times we had together were gone." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by mahatma gandhi
item.description: "I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet." -- mahatma gandhi

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "When I despair, I remember that all through history the way of truth and love have always won. There have been tyrants and murderers, and for a time, they can seem invincible, but in the end, they always fall. Think of it--always." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Nobody can hurt me without my permission." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Man often becomes what he believes himself to be. If I keep on saying to myself that I cannot do a certain thing, it is possible that I may end by really becoming incapable of doing it. On the contrary, if I have the belief that I can do it, I shall surely acquire the capacity to do it even if I may not have it at the beginning." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The greatness of a nation and its moral progress can be judged by the way its animals are treated." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "In doing something, do it with love or never do it at all." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The only tyrant I accept is the still, small voice within me." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jo-ann add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "In a gentle way, you can shake the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi
